title: Is troling bots in co-op vs AI  bannable?
body:
Hello dear friends,

I have been spending some time playing vs bots (to learn new champion mechanics) and i noticed that most of my teamates are bots. They dont listen to any chat they just go to any lane they want and move in specific patterns. I even get some games where i am the only real player. So i dicied to have some fun by playing as Tahm , bard and anivia to troll them. I want to do this but haven't done it yet cause i wanted to know whether this is seen as greefing. We always end up winning cause bots are so bad but i was wondering wether this still seen as greenfing. 

Kind regards, 
IronLurd
